title: Strengthening Curriculum Development Practical Competencies: Simulation-Based Mathematical Problem-Solving Competency Assessment Course

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: They can perform mathematical problem-solving procedures in a simulation environment with over 80% accuracy.
During team projects, they can analyze collaboration patterns with peers to achieve efficiency metrics of at least 75%.
They can explain the correlation between spatial mobility data and problem-solving outcomes at a level of 0.6 or higher.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
